definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: feel loathing (cf. Syr. bh.iyl (so in lexx.) nauseated (yet v. Gei:Urschrift, 270); NSyr. bah.lel envy cf. Stoddard:Gram. 12, 57)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[בָּֽחֲלָה]] Zec 11:8 [[וַתִּקְחַר נַפְשִׁי בָּהֶם וְגַם נַפְשָׁם]] [[בִי]] ´[[בּ]] felt a loathing against me.
